name: The Sword of Roshon
overview: Sword of Roshon is an interactive fiction story for the TRS-80. The player takes the role of Josh, who is transported to another land with his dog Grover to help the Lizardman Oracan defeat the evil rulers of the land Dalmark and Marelda. The player is presented with a number of multiple choice situations to advance the story, and must choose the correct directions to survive their adventure.
